name: Practice_SARTools
abstract: Learn how to perform DEA (Differential Expression Analysis) based on a scaled, normalized, and filtered DESeq2 object folowwing SARTools framework
description: This material contains example dataset (counts files), script and target file to execute all reproducible steps for a classic DEA analysis ; presented on the EBAII 2023 session
teaches: The student will be able to load counts from RNASeq pipeline
The student will be able to create a DESeq2 object
The student will be able to normalize data
The student will be able to visualize counts and interpret diagnostic plots
The student will be albe to draw basic results graphs
The student will be able to save results as CSV, figures as .png and analysis summary/report as .pdf
keywords: SARTools, DESeq2, R, Differential Expression Analysis
